data.description: OO access to the GPS services at Nextbus.com
data.communities: Posted as WWW::Nextbus last week to modules@perl.org
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I scheduled WWW::Nextbus (registration attempt last week) for
    deletion and replaced the package with WebService::Nextbus as I was
    advised. Unfortunately, the WWW package was already indexed, so
    someone will probably want to free up the WWW namespace I
    transiently, misguidedly occupied. The deletion should go through by
    Friday.

    WebService::Nextbus also occupies WebService::Nextbus::Agency and
    WebService::Nextbus::Agency::SFMUNI. In the future, I expect it
    other subclasses of Agency to be built, representing other specific
    agencies. Right now, SFMUNI is the only one and is prototypical.
